name: Agora Token Service
description: an Agora Token Server using Golang & Gin to run as a webservice

APP_ID.description: Agora.io App ID: Login to the Agora.io Developer Dashboard (http://dashboard.agora.io), and navigate to the "Projects" tab to get this value

APP_CERTIFICATE.description: Agora.io App Certificate: Login to the Agora.io Developer Dashboard (http://dashboard.agora.io), and navigate to the "Projects" tab to get this value

CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.description: The allowed origin for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). This determines which origins are permitted to access the resources of your application.
